offences.offenceWording: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford intentionally obstructed a person authorised by the BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
offences.offenceWordingWelsh: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford intentionally obstructed a person authorised by the BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
offences.prosecutionFacts: On 01/11/2017 at Chelmsford, the defendant intentionally obstructed a person authorised by BBC in the exercise of a power conferred by virtue of a search warrant issued under section 366 of the Communications Act 2003 by Chelmsford Magistrates Court on 25/10/2017
